title: Rizwan expected to be named as vice-captain of T20 team
text:
Wicket-keeper batsman Mohammad Rizwan is likely to be named as vice-captain of Pakistan T20 side, sources close to the matter revealed.

Meanwhile the board is considering to appoint Babar Azam as vice-captain of the Test team, his name is also under the consideration for the leadership of the national ODI team.

On Friday, the 25-year-old batsman replaced Sarfaraz Ahmed to captain the team in the shortest format of the game.

According to the source, the ODI captain will be announced after the upcoming tour of Australia.

The official announcement of Test and T20 vice-captain will be made in a timely manner.

PCB removes Sarfaraz Ahmed as Test, T20I captain
